TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ColorTranslator extends System.Object

summary.span: 在色彩和 GDI+ 結構之間來回轉換。

span.span: Translates colors to and from GDI+ structures.
This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Drawing.Color FromHtml (string htmlColor);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Color FromHtml(string htmlColor) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromHtml (htmlColor As String) As Color
public: static System::Drawing::Color FromHtml(System::String ^ htmlColor);

param.name: htmlColor
param.span: 要轉換的 Html 色彩字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the Html color to translate.

summary.span: 將 HTML 色彩表示轉換為 GDI+ 結構。

span.span: Translates an HTML color representation to a GDI+ structure.

returns.span: 結構，表示要轉換的 HTML 色彩；如果是 是 則為 。

span.span: The structure that represents the translated HTML color or if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會轉譯 HTML 色彩名稱，例如藍色或紅色，以 GDI + 中的字串表示結構。This method translates a string representation of an HTML color name, such as Blue or Red, to a GDI+ structure. ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會將轉譯的 HTML 色彩名稱結構，然後使用該色彩填滿的矩形。The code translates an HTML color name to a structure, and then uses that color to fill a rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不是有效的 HTML 色彩名稱。

span.span: is not a valid HTML color name.

param.span: 要轉換的 OLE 色彩。

span.span: The OLE color to translate.

summary.span: 將 OLE 色彩值轉換為 GDI+ 結構。

span.span: Translates an OLE color value to a GDI+ structure.

returns.span: 結構，表示要轉換的 OLE 色彩。

span.span: The structure that represents the translated OLE color.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼，若要將 OLE 色彩值轉譯結構，然後使用該色彩填滿的矩形。The code translates an OLE color value to a structure, and then uses that color to fill a rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼 Windows 色彩值轉譯成結構，然後使用該色彩填滿的矩形。The code translates a Windows color value to a structure, and then uses that color to fill a rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string ToHtml (System.Drawing.Color c);
.method public static hidebysig string ToHtml(valuetype System.Drawing.Color c) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToHtml (c As Color) As String
public: static System::String ^ ToHtml(System::Drawing::Color c);

span.span: The structure to translate.

summary.span: 將指定的 結構轉換為 HTML 字串色彩表示。

span.span: Translates the specified structure to an HTML string color representation.

returns.span: 字串，表示 HTML 色彩。

span.span: The string that represents the HTML color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會轉譯HTML 色彩的字串表示法的結構。This method translates a structure to a string representation of an HTML color. 這是色彩的常用，例如"Red"、"Blue"，或 「 綠色 」 的名稱與不數字的色彩值，例如"FF33AA"的字串表示。This is the commonly used name of a color, such as "Red", "Blue", or "Green", and not string representation of a numeric color value, such as "FF33AA". ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會將轉譯結構以和字串表示的 HTML 色彩，然後顯示訊息方塊，以產生的字串。The code translates a structure to a string representation of an HTML color, and then shows a message box with the resulting string. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

public: static int ToOle(System::Drawing::Color c);

span.span: The structure to translate.

summary.span: 將指定的 結構轉換為 OLE 色彩。

span.span: Translates the specified structure to an OLE color.
The OLE color value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會將轉譯結構為整數，表示 OLE 色彩，然後顯示訊息方塊，以產生的字串。The code translates a structure to an integer that represents an OLE color, and then shows a message box with the resulting string. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]
